pages.text: Wood goes in, then gets refined based on the block or item that you have placed on the Saw's recipe filter. $(br2)Please refer to the Ponder viewer by holding W while the mouse is hovering over the item on the top of this page for a more thorough explanation.

Notice: You must set a filter to get the output you want if an input ingredient has many outcomes. $(br2)The Mechanical Saw can also be used to damage mobs and can be used in place of lava. Damage dealt is dependent on how fast it is rotating.
